resources.string: Screen shot of infinite cube scene. A blue background with a single cube. The entire scene projected onto the cube, creating an infinite mirror effect.
Screen shot of Infinite Capsules scene. Black and white. A sea of capsules with a black orb ahead, emitting light that shades each capsule.

Screen shot of Menger Prison scene. A space made out of a fractal geometry called a Menger Sponge. The Menger Sponge is built using a cube made from smaller cubes, but missing its center on each face, as well as the core of the cube. These "core-less" cubes are built to make bigger "core-less" cubes and the pattern repeats.
Screen shot of Mandelbrot scene. A rosy accented fractal pattern from the famous Mandelbrot set.
